installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

## File: DayZ Egg - egg-dayz.json
## Author: David Wolfe (Red-Thirten)
## Date: 2024/06/05
## License: MIT License
## Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'

## Download and install SteamCMD
export HOME=/mnt/server
cd /tmp
mkdir -p $HOME/steamcmd $HOME/steamapps
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C $HOME/steamcmd
cd $HOME/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

# Install/Verify game server using SteamCMD
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir $HOME "+login \"${STEAM_USER}\" \"${STEAM_PASS}\"" +app_update ${STEAMCMD_APPID} $( [[ -z ${STEAMCMD_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${STEAMCMD_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${STEAMCMD_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${STEAMCMD_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit

# Set up 32 and 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p $HOME/.steam/sdk{32,64}
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so $HOME/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so $HOME/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## DayZ Setup
cd $HOME

# Check for successful installation
if [ ! -f DayZServer ] || [ ! -f serverDZ.cfg ]; then
    echo -e "\n\n[ERROR] SteamCMD failed to install the DayZ Dedicated Server!"
    echo -e "\tTry reinstalling the server again.\n"
    exit 1
fi

# Add required steamQueryPort parameter to end of default serverDZ.cfg (if it's missing)
if ! grep -q "steamQueryPort" serverDZ.cfg; then
    echo -e '\nAdding required additional parameters to end of default "serverDZ.cfg"...'
cat >> serverDZ.cfg << EOL


steamQueryPort = 2305;
EOL
fi

# Check for BattlEye RCon configuration
echo -e '\nCreating BattlEye RCon Configuration.'
cat > $HOME/battleye/beserver_x64.cfg << EOF
RConPort ${RCON_PORT}
RConPassword ${RCON_PASSWORD}
RestrictRCon 0
EOF

echo -e "\nDayZ Dedicated Server successfully installed!\n"

variables.name: [Host] Steam Query Port
variables.description: UDP port for Steam server list features. Helps the server be visible in the client server browser.

variables.name: Steam Username
variables.description: Used for installation and updates. Account does not need to own DayZ, but MUST BE a VALID Steam account (anonymous login cannot be used). For security reasons it is recommended that you create a new Steam account just for your dedicated servers. *This info is not visible to the server owner.*

variables.name: Steam Password
variables.description: Used for installation and updates. Steam Guard MUST be completely TURNED OFF for the server and mods to download efficiently. *This info is not visible to the server owner, BUT IS stored in PLAIN TEXT. It is NOT advised to use a personal account; best to use a dummy account.*

variables.name: Disable Mod Downloads/Updates
variables.description: If the Steam account does not own the base DayZ game, Steam Workshop mod downloads/updates will not work. If so, this setting allows disabling of this feature to avoid errors. (1 ON | 0 OFF)

variables.name: Number of SteamCMD Retry Attempts
variables.description: How many times SteamCMD should retry downloading a server or mod after a recoverable error. (ie. A particularly large mod download times out)

variables.name: Automatic Updates
variables.description: Quickly checks for any server or mod updates on startup, and updates if necessary.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name of the server that will appear in the server list.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum number of players allowed to join the server.

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Password required to join the server. Leave blank to have no password.

variables.name: Admin Password
variables.description: Password to log in as an admin on the server.

variables.name: RCON Port
variables.description: Used by Tools or Battlemetrics to manage servers from outside. RCON Port is recommended to be at Game Port +3. For example, If the Game Port is 2302, then RCON Port should be 2305.

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: This password is used to authenticate third parties to access server controls via RCON.

variables.name: Modlist File (Exported from DayZ Launcher)
variables.description: Filename for an exported modlist. This file will be parsed for mod installation and loading. Upload your HTML file to the root directory (eg. /home/container/modlist.html). Leave blank to disable loading mods from a modlist.

variables.name: Additional Mods
variables.description: A semicolon-separated list of mod folders to load from the root directory. Useful for loading manually uploaded mods. Any mods in this list that are in "@workshopID" form will also be included in Automatic Updates (if enabled). NO capital letters, spaces, or folders starting with a number! (ex. myMod;@123456789;@987654321;etc;)

variables.name: Verify Signatures
variables.description: Ensures all clients have exactly the same version of mods or addons that the server is running. Otherwise, they will be kicked upon connection. (2 ON | 0 OFF)

variables.name: Enforce Game Version
variables.description: When ON, the server will allow the connection only to clients with same the version as the server.

variables.name: Disable VoN
variables.description: When ON, will disable Voice over Network (voice chat) in the server.

variables.name: VoN Quality
variables.description: Voice over Network codec quality; the higher the better. (Values 0-30)

variables.name: Disable Third Person
variables.description: When ON, will disable third person view while on the server.

variables.name: Disable Crosshair
variables.description: When ON, will disable the crosshair from being visible while on the server.

variables.name: Disable Personal Light
variables.description: When ON, will disable a personal light positioned above all clients during the night time while on the server.

variables.name: Darker Nights
variables.description: When ON, will make nights darker (more accurate nights, but hard to see without a light).

variables.name: Persistent Time
variables.description: The actual server time is saved to storage, so when ON, the next server start will use the saved time value.

variables.name: Time Multiplier
variables.description: This is a time multiplier for in-game time (ie. 12 would move a full 24-hour day in-game 12 times faster, making it last 2 hours "in real life"). (Values: 0-24)

variables.name: Night Multiplier
variables.description: This is an additional multiplier to either speed up or slow down nights in-game. It is multiplied with the "Time Multiplier" variable to get it's final multiplier for night time speed. (Values: 0.1-64.0)

variables.name: [Repair] Make Mod Files Lowercase
variables.description: Every mod that is set to be loaded will have its folder and files changed to lowercase (to prevent errors). It is recommended to enable this for one server boot after copying a mod from a Windows machine to the server, or if mods seem to not be loading.

variables.name: [Repair] Validate Server Files
variables.description: Validates all server files when Automatic Updates is ON. Note: This will significantly increase server startup times, so it is recommended to only enable this when needed.

variables.name: [Advanced] Server-Side Only Mods
variables.description: Mod folders to be used with the "-serverMods" startup option. They only run server-side and are not required by clients if "Verify Signatures" is ON. Any mods in this list that are in "@workshopID" form will also be included in Automatic Updates (if enabled). NO capital letters, spaces, or folders starting with a number! Each folder must be followed with a semicolon (ex. @123456789;@987654321;etc;)

variables.name: [Advanced] Extra Startup Parameters
variables.description: See https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/DayZ:Server_Configuration#Launch_Parameters for more info on valid flags for this field.

variables.name: [Advanced] Server Binary
variables.description: Cannot currently be changed. Left in case other branches with different executable names are introduced at a later date.

variables.name: [Advanced] DayZ Dedicated Server App ID
variables.description: Used for installation and updates. Rarely needs to be changed. 223350 is for Stable branch and 1042420 is for experimental branch. Changing branches may require deleting all server files and reinstalling.
